title: My plea to the Polish PM: Please veto an Article 50 extension and help us get Brexit done
text:
Premier Mateusz Morawiecki,

Throughout my life, I have been proud of the extraordinary support the UK has provided to Poland. In the aftermath of World War Two, the UK refused to accept or tolerate Soviet dominion over Central and Eastern Europe. Instead, the UK began to agitate against the authoritarian communist regimes that brought endless misery to so many.

These efforts reached a dramatic conclusion under Margaret Thatcher. As Prime Minister, she demonstrated tremendous courage and leadership alongside Ronald Reagan’s United States to challenge the Soviet Union. British and American military preparedness and tough diplomacy, with the full might of the NATO alliance, were instrumental in...
